events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting experience in backend development using Java and Python.
The recruiting team categorized the application under Engineering due to the candidate's experience with software development and relevant technical skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles was assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process and coordinate upcoming interviews.
The candidate completed the initial phone screening successfully, demonstrating a strong understanding of software design principles and coding best practices.
The candidate promptly responded to the interview scheduling email, expressing enthusiasm to proceed with the technical interview stage.
A technical interview was scheduled with the candidate for the upcoming Thursday at 10 AM to assess coding skills and problem-solving capabilities.
The technical interview was completed successfully with the candidate solving complex algorithm challenges and explaining system design concepts clearly.
HR interview was scheduled for the candidate to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and company policies next Monday afternoon.
HR completed the interview covering candidate expectations and compensation; the discussion was smooth and the candidate showed good alignment with company values.
An offer letter was sent to the candidate detailing base salary, benefits, and start date, reflecting a competitive compensation package.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested a brief timeline to consider before final acceptance.
The candidate accepted the job offer enthusiastically and confirmed their start date, expressing excitement to join the engineering team.
Onboarding process was initiated with the candidate receiving access to company tools and orientation schedule for a smooth transition.
The hiring process was officially closed after successful onboarding, marking the candidate's official start as a software engineer at the company.
